channel.title: Stuck at updating 1%
channel.description:
Players stuck at updating 1% when the clients loading any ideas why.
someone told me this occurs when the servers offline but it is actually online.
[url=http://www.exoticpks.com/client2.html]Exotic[/url]
any ideas?
